verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Only believe, only believe,
All things are possible, only believe;
Only believe, only believe,
All things are possible, only believe.
(Lord, I believe...)
(Lord, I receive...)
(Jesus is here...)

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Fear not, little flock,
From the cross to the throne;
From death into life
He went for His own;
All power in earth,
All power above,
Is given to Him
For the flock of His love.

verse.name: c2
verse.lines:
Only believe, only believe,
All things are possible, only believe;
Only believe, only believe,
All things are possible, only believe.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Fear not, little flock,
He goeth ahead,
Your shepherd selecteth
The path you must tread;
The waters of Marah
He'll sweeten for thee,
He drank all the bitter
in Gethsemane.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Fear not, little flock,
What ever your lot,
He enters all rooms,
"The doors being shut;"
He never forsakes,
He never is gone,
So count on His presence
In darkness and dawn.
